definition: to prepare to film/to plan a shoot
chip (in gambling)/token (for counting)/ticket/to prepare/to plan/to raise (funds)/resource/means
to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)

sentences.english: It was more than one year ago when I heard about the preparation of this movie.
sentences.chinese: 記得剛聽說片子籌拍的消息時，是一年多以前。

sentences.english: It is Billie Piper in 1984 China Central Television TV series.
sentences.chinese: 那是一九八四年中央電視臺籌拍電視連續劇。

sentences.english: The sails have been stowed on the next "Pirates of the Caribbean" sequel.
sentences.chinese: 《加勒比海盜》下一部續集的籌拍計劃已經提上日程。

sentences.english: In addition to that, the publicity of her to- be-pictured film Hua Hun.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，就是對籌拍《畫魂》的宣傳。
